problem.markdown:
>>True or False: The text 'Number of' is appropriate at the beginning of a data element name. (1 attempt)<<
( ) True (x) False
[explanation] It can be used in the form or in the description, but it is not required in the actual name. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: True or False: The text 'Number of' is appropriate at the beginning of a data element name. (1 attempt)

div.p: It can be used in the form or in the description, but it is not required in the actual name.
